Jeff,

Per my voice mail....

As you know from our prior
conversations, a few years ago,
Global Payments acquired a
company called Card Connect,
a reseller of Shift4's software
and payment gateway services.
As we discussed, on multiple
occasions, Card Connect has
created significant issues for
Shift4. These issues include,
but are not limited to:

1.  Card Connect has
repeatedly (and intentionally)
undercut Shift4's pricing to
merchants, forcing Shift4 to
lower our rates to retain the
accounts.
2.  Card Connect has
repeatedly represented
themselves as "Shift4" to
customers, causing merchant
confusion, brand confusion,
and damaging Shift4's
reputation and good will.
3. Card Connect has failed to
pay Shift4 for software,
hardware, services and
related expenses,
